import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import plotly.graph_objects as go
import plotly.offline as pyo
import warnings
import os
import sys

warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')
plt.style.use('ggplot')
pyo.init_notebook_mode()

df1 = df[['Solo score']]
df1 = df1.sort_values(by='Solo score', ascending=False).head(50)

source.8c338073:
df5 = df[['Solo kd', 'Solo winRatio']].sort_values(by=['Solo kd', 'Solo winRatio'], ascending=[False, False]).head(50)
fig5 = go.Figure(data = [
    go.Bar(name = 'Solo kd', x=df5.index, y=df5['Solo kd']), 
    go.Bar(name = 'Solo winRatio', x=df5.index, y=df5['Solo winRatio'])])

fig5.update_layout(barmode='group')
fig5.show()
